body:
There's been several times I've wanted to have a personal conversation with someone instead of making it public but there doesn't seem to be an option to do so. Am I missing it somehow or is it really not a feature?

If it's not on here yet, I personally think it would be a great idea!
body_html:
There's been several times I've wanted to have a personal conversation with someone instead of making it public but there doesn't seem to be an option to do so. Am I missing it somehow or is it really not a feature?

If it's not on here yet, I personally think it would be a great idea!

The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus
